Dummy::DummyAgentFactory

Dummy::DummyAgentFactory Class Reference

#include <dummyagentfactory.hh>

Inheritance diagram for Dummy::DummyAgentFactory:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

simple implementation of an agentfactory

this is a minimal implemtation of the agentfactory. it generates agents that can not really do anything.

Author:
Garrit Jentsch
Date:
Oct 14, 2009 last edited Oct 15, 2009

Member Function Documentation

Agent * DummyAgentFactory::createAgent (  )  [virtual]

create agent of a certain type. encapsulates everything that has to be done, i.e. it adds actions, simulator, messagegenerators, and communicator to the agent. the simulator is also told to connect to the database and initialize itself.

Returns:
pointer to constructed agent

Implements Hive::AgentFactory.

References Hive::Agent::addAction(), Hive::Database::addData(), Hive::Agent::addMessageGenerator(), Hive::Agent::addSimulator(), Hive::Agent::getDatabase(), Hive::IntegerData::getDataName(), and Hive::Action::setAgent().
